description.en:
The Crown Commercial Service is an executive agency and trading fund of the Cabinet Office of the UK Government.

It primarily contains entries for government buyers, but also include companies and "Not for profits" (churches are in this category, for instance). The sectors covered are:
* Local Government 
* Education 
* Police 
* Health 
* Devolved Administrations 
* Wider Public Sector 
* Private 
* Central Government 
* Fire and Rescue 
* Utility Historic

access.onlineAccessDetails: It is possible to download a full list of customers
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: Unique identifiers are listed under 'URN' in the downloadable file

data.dataAccessDetails: The latest list of customers can be downloaded from https://www.gov.uk/guidance/current-crown-commercial-service-suppliers-what-you-need-to-know#customer-unique-reference-number-urn-list
data.licenseDetails: There is no reference to licensing within the downloaded file. The page that links to it has the OGL "All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated" in the footer, next to a Â© Crown Copyright image.
